definition: content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
to check/to examine/to inspect/to exercise restraint

sentences.english: Attendees must pass through airport-like security.
sentences.chinese: 參加者必須通過機場式的安檢。

sentences.english: I have had a background check done by security and have been found to be a Safe Person.
sentences.chinese: 安檢部門對我的背景來歷覈查過，認定我爲人可靠。

sentences.english: Vehicle regular-check and road administration management.
Several demonstrations took place peacefully at security check points near the U. S. Capitol building.
sentences.chinese: 在美國國會大廈附近的安檢站也發生了幾次和平示威。

sentences.english: Police officers searched visitors trying to enter the area surrounding the World Trade Center.
sentences.chinese: 警察隊進入世貿中心周邊區域的遊客進行安檢。

sentences.english: Please take out your things out of your pockets, and go through the security gate.
sentences.chinese: 請拿出你隨身攜帶的東西，通過安檢門。

sentences.english: Travelers, please take note, the D76 train from Shanghai to Qingdao has begun checking tickets.
sentences.chinese: 你好，可以讓我們先安檢嗎？我們的火車開始檢票了。

sentences.english: Animals are clearly one of the biggest threats to borderline security.
sentences.chinese: 對於邊境安檢而言，動物顯然是最大的威脅之一。

sentences.english: As she looked ahead down the long ramp leading to the guard's gate, her heart sank.
sentences.chinese: 低頭看着前面通往安檢門的坡道，她的心沉了下去。

sentences.english: The security check will last for 7 months.
sentences.chinese: 此次陸路道口安檢將持續7個月。

sentences.english: Patrol supervise/safety check on all production machines.
sentences.chinese: 巡檢，安檢所有生產設備。

sentences.english: Also, PA equipment were added as well, alerting the passengers not taking contraband.
sentences.chinese: 安檢等待區還增配了，反覆通知旅客不許攜帶違禁品。

sentences.english: I am a security officer, show me your document, please.
sentences.chinese: 我是安檢員，請出示您的證件。

sentences.english: The security check at railway stations is an important section in the line of defence against dangers and explosion.
sentences.chinese: 鐵路車站安檢工作是查危防爆安全防線上的重要一環。

sentences.english: The men used their airport identification cards to bypass security screeners .
sentences.chinese: 這兩人通過他們的機場身份證，繞過了安檢通道。

sentences.english: China beefs up security checks for Asian Games.
sentences.chinese: 中國加強廣州亞運會安檢工作。

definition: to cross a barrier/to get through (an ordeal)/to pass (a test)/to reach (a standard)
to get on or into (a bus, train, car etc)
car door/door of bus, railway carriage etc
to check/to examine/to inspect/to exercise restraint
to start/to set in motion/to move/to march/to dig in (eating)/to tuck in (eating)
